responsibilities: Build impactful solutions that empower millions of users through Fintech applications.
Experiment with cutting-edge machine learning modeling techniques.
Work on both early-stage (0-1) and growth-stage (1-10) problems.
Develop AI/ML models through a full life cycle, from offline training to online serving and monitoring.
Collaborate with teams across Plaid to define the machine learning roadmap.
Dive deep into data and apply data-driven decisions in day-to-day work.
qualifications: Experience with state-of-the-art machine learning and modeling techniques.
Proficiency in natural language processing, anomaly detection, optimization, and time series forecasting.
Ability to design, build, and deploy scalable ML solutions and systems.
Strong coding skills, particularly with Python, Spark, Jupyter notebooks, and standard ML libraries.
Data analytics and data engineering experience.
analysis:
The job involves building impactful solutions through Fintech applications and experimenting with cutting-edge machine learning modeling techniques. It requires developing AI/ML models through a full life cycle, from offline training to online serving and monitoring. The skills required include experience with state-of-the-art machine learning and modeling techniques, proficiency in natural language processing, and the ability to design, build, and deploy scalable ML solutions and systems.

The mention of "natural language processing" in the skills section suggests that there is a possibility of working with language models. However, there is no explicit mention of Generative AI or Large Language Models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus seems to be more on general machine learning and AI/ML model development rather than specifically on GenAI or LLMs.

Therefore, while there is a potential overlap with language models due to the natural language processing skill, the job does not explicitly indicate a focus on Generative AI or LLMs.
